name: Mountain Eyes
description: Your gaze cuts through vapors with ease.
benefit: You ignore concealment (but not total concealment) caused by fog, rain, smoke, wind, and other gases or weather effects (including magical effects like obscuring mist), and you ignore up to â€“4 in penalties on Perception checks from such effects. You treat total concealment resulting from any such gas or weather effects within 10 feet of you as concealment (20% miss chance).
